allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: PropertyOS - Multi-tenant Property Management System

Features:
- Next.js 15 frontend with React 18
- NestJS backend with Prisma ORM
- Multi-tenant architecture
- Authentication with JWT
- Property, tenant, and lease management
- Maintenance request system
- Document management
- Payment processing with Stripe
- Email/SMS notifications

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash("C:\\Program Files\\GitHub CLI\\gh.exe" repo create property-management --public --source=. --remote=origin --push --description "PropertyOS - Multi-tenant Property Management System")
Bash("C:\\Program Files\\GitHub CLI\\gh.exe" auth refresh -s workflow)
Bash("C:\\Program Files\\GitHub CLI\\gh.exe" auth refresh -h github.com -s workflow)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Zeabur deployment: use pnpm and monorepo config

- Added packageManager: pnpm to zeabur.json
- Use corepack enable to ensure pnpm is available
- Added Dockerfiles as fallback for deployment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update Zeabur config, remove Dockerfiles

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Prisma build: add generate step and fix type errors

- Fix PrismaService to use type casting for $connect/$disconnect
- Update turbo.json to run generate before build
- Update Zeabur build commands to include prisma generate

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
